snippet.title: I left Ubisoft to make my Dream Survival Builder Game | Lueur Devlog #0
snippet.description:
Have you ever wanted to make your own strategy game? I've always dreamed of creating a classic 2D grid world with my own ideas incorporated. Follow along in this devlog series to see how I'm turning that dream into a reality.
Lueur is a minimalist and cozy city-builder game about bringing back light to the world.
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2308630?utm_source=youtube

Chapters:
00:00 tale of a darkened world
00:54 intro
01:29 origins of the game
03:18 game core ideas
04:45 a "minimalist" game
06:03 game mechanics and system
07:26 outro
